# Self Review Checklist

### Code quality

- [ ] Code is readable and minimal
- [ ] Names are clear and consistent
- [ ] No hardcoded values / credentials
- [ ] Functions do one clear thing

### Frontend

- [ ] No visual regressions
- [ ] Works on mobile and desktop
- [ ] No console warnings

### Content / API

- [ ] Correct fields queried from Hygraph
- [ ] No unnecessary fields fetched
- [ ] Graceful fallback if data missing

### Project hygiene

- [ ] Branch name matches scope
- [ ] PR title is conventional
- [ ] Commits are atomic and meaningful
